1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Content operators on types.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Cop.Type
6  ( copsType
7    -- $Operators
8  ) where
9
10import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base            as B
11import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data            as D
12import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Cop.Message     as Msg
13
14
15
16-- ----------------------
17-- $Operators
18--
19--  [@to-dec@]     Convert to decimal.
20--
21--  [@to-list@]    Convert to list.
22--
23--  [@to-set@]     Convert to set.
24--
25--  [@to-text@]    Convert to text.
26--
27
28-- | Content operators on types.
29copsType :: (D.CContent c) => [D.Cop c]
30copsType =
31    [ D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "to-dec")       copToDec
32    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "to-list")      copToList
33    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "to-set")       copToSet
34    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "to-text")      copToText
35    ]
36
37typeUnmatch :: D.CTypeOf c => [B.Ab c] -> B.Ab c
38typeUnmatch _ = Msg.unmatchType ""
39
40copToDec :: (D.CContent c) => D.CopCalc c
41copToDec = op where
42    op [Right c] | D.isText c  = case D.decodeDecimal $ D.gText c of
43                                   Right n  -> Right $ D.pDec n
44                                   Left _   -> Right c
45                 | D.isBool c  = case D.gBool c of
46                                   True   -> Right $ D.pInt 1
47                                   False  -> Right $ D.pInt 0
48                 | otherwise   = Right c
49    op xs = typeUnmatch xs
50
51copToText :: (D.CContent c) => D.CopCalc c
52copToText = op where
53    op [Right c] = Right $ D.pText $ D.contentString c
54    op xs = typeUnmatch xs
55
56copToList :: (D.CContent c) => D.CopCalc c
57copToList = op where
58    op [Right c] | D.isSet c   = Right $ D.pList $ D.gSet c
59                 | otherwise   = Right c
60    op xs = typeUnmatch xs
61
62copToSet :: (D.CContent c) => D.CopCalc c
63copToSet = op where
64    op [Right c] | D.isList c  = Right $ D.pSet $ D.gList c
65                 | otherwise   = Right c
66    op xs = typeUnmatch xs
67
